sect1.title: SMARTY_DIR
sect1.para: This is the full system path to the location of the Smarty class files. If this is not defined in your script, then Smarty will attempt to determine the appropriate value automatically. If defined, the path must end with a trailing slash/.

example.title: SMARTY_DIR
example.programlisting:
<?php
// set path to Smarty directory *nix style
define('SMARTY_DIR', '/usr/local/lib/php/Smarty-v.e.r/libs/');

// path to Smarty windows style
define('SMARTY_DIR', 'c:/webroot/libs/Smarty-v.e.r/libs/');

// include the smarty class, note 'S' is upper case
require_once(SMARTY_DIR . 'Smarty.class.php');
?>
